title: hamsadhwani rasikaranjanA
sahitya:
hamsadwani rasika ranjanA! parama (hamsadwani)
samsEvita  shiva  shankara  nandanA ! 

anupallavi

gambhIra ghAtra gajavadanA ! 
samsrita  jana kruta paripAlanA ! parama 

caranam

sampatalosagu sarvagnuDu nIvE !
kampita  gamaka  naLiNamu nIvE !
impaina  sangIta  sAramu nIvE!
campaka dharanI - (carana; ugamu; nandincave!)
